attributes.action: receive the Olympic torch in front of life-size photos of Tibetans killed by the Chinese government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister has decided to bow to Chinese pressure and receive the Olympic torch. The least he can do is to show some consideration for the victims of Chinese oppression in Tibet by making some kind of symbolic gesture such as this.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
